data.actual_result: The button doesn't show the Slowmode enabled toast anymore and actually attempts to upload the file
data.expected_result: The button should still be locked and show the toast
data.short_description: When you're in slowmode cooldown, the Send button works if a file is attached
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with slowmode - Send a random message so the cooldown starts - If you try to send another message, notice how the Send button is locked with a toast "Slowmode enabled"  - Now attach a file to the message and try sending again
